title: "Example Post: R + Python Analysis"
date: 2025-04-24
categories: [blog, analysis]

# Introduction

This post demonstrates a simple analysis mixing R and Python.

# Data Summary





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
summary(mtcars)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
      mpg             cyl             disp             hp       
 Min.   :10.40   Min.   :4.000   Min.   : 71.1   Min.   : 52.0

 Max.   :33.90   Max.   :8.000   Max.   :472.0   Max.   :335.0  
      drat             wt             qsec             vs

 1st Qu.:3.080   1st Qu.:2.581   1st Qu.:16.89   1st Qu.:0.0000

       am              gear            carb
```

# Python Calculation





::: {.cell}

```{.python .cell-code}
import pandas as pd
pd.DataFrame({'a': [1,2], 'b': [3,4]}).describe()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
              a         b
count  2.000000  2.000000
mean   1.500000  3.500000
std    0.707107  0.707107
min    1.000000  3.000000
25%    1.250000  3.250000
50%    1.500000  3.500000
75%    1.750000  3.750000
max    2.000000  4.000000
```


:::
:::





# Figure Example

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(iris$Sepal.Length, iris$Sepal.Width, main="Iris Sepal")
```
